title: Add new config variable
message_prompt: Add a new attribute to Config called llm_feature_filter. Copy everything from auto_context_tokens except the abbreviation, which should be 'l', and the description, which should be: "Send this many tokens of auto-context-selected code files to an LLM along with the user_prompt to post-select only files which are relevant to the task. Post-files will then be sent to the LLM again to respond to the user's prompt."
